title: Pixel 4xl stuck on 50% . Switches off randomly and has a battery symbol with a (?).
content: My google Pixel 4 XL is randomly shutting down, not charging past 50%, and displaying a battery symbol with a question mark in it. I have tried pushing down on the Google symbol on the back, restarting it, etc. and nothing has worked. The warrantee ran out and I don't know what else to do.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
